page.title: 14BRANT BROUGHTON POST OFFICE
page.content: I interviewed my mother about her work at the post office.She mainly sells stamps, postal orders,premium bonds and saving stamps and certificates. The item she sells most of is postage stamps, about Â£200 worth each week mainly 1st. class. Thursday is her busiest day when old age pensions are paid out .People expect her to know whats happening in the village especially as many posters are displayed. She said she particularly liked the communication with the village people who are very friendly.The forms people ask for the most are motor vehicle and driving licence application forms.The parcel trade has increased over the last three years.The post box is cleared twice daily--11am and 4pm.She said she found her job very rewarding and it provides a service that villages need.
